---
title: "Population Var for TB"
author: "James R. Hunter"
date: "6/26/2018"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r process, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
brics <- c("Brazil", "Russian Federation", "India", "China", "South Africa")
popTB <- read_csv("~/Documents/MAD/TB_burden_countries_2018-06-24.csv") %>% 
  select(country, year, pop = e_pop_num) %>% 
  filter(country %in% brics) %>% 
  filter(year %in% 2002:2011)
glimpse(popTB)
saveRDS(popTB, file = "popTB.rds")
```
